title: A husband and his wife had a bitter quarrel on the day of their 40th wedding ann...
body_value:
A husband and his wife had a bitter quarrel on the day of their 40th wedding anniversary.
The husband yelled, 'When you die, I'm getting you a headstone that reads:
"Here Lies My Wife - Cold As Ever".'

'Yeah,' she replies, 'when you die, I'm getting you a headstone that reads:
"Here Lies My Husband - Stiff At Last".'

title: Two guys were hiking through the jungle when they spotted a tiger who looked bot...
body_value:
Two guys were hiking through the jungle when they spotted a tiger who looked both hungry and fast. One of the guys reached into his pack and pulled out a pair of Nikes.

His friend looked at him "Do you really think those shoes are going to make you run faster than that tiger?"

I don't have to run faster than that tiger,his friend replied. "I just have to run faster than you".

title:
"It won't fit," she groaned, "it's just too big."

"Of course it will" I said an...
body_value:
"It won't fit," she groaned, "it's just too big."

"Of course it will" I said anxiously, "try a different angle."

After a few more failed attempts, I realised it wasn't going to happen.

"Don't worry about it" I said, "this happens to me all the time."

"I guess that makes it a bit less humiliating" she laughed.

"Yeah" I smiled, "just get out and I'll park the car for you."
